application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: 1/ Cypress- tree had large limb snap out leaving crown slightly disfigured.To rebalance crown tree requires a full reduction removing approximately 1-2 metres in height from crown and approximately 1.5 metres from side branches leaving natural symmetrical and conical crown.2/ Smaller Cypress- this tree is growing next to above cypress and both trees form 1 crown.I would like to reduce this tree to match in with the above Cypress. Removing approximately 0.5 metres in height from crown and approximately 1 metre from side of crown.My client has had consent from Hamstead Garden Trust for the above works.My client also had previous consent for similar works on the above trees from Barnet council. No tree work took place and the consent has now expired.
